description: Jeremy Bilding was caught by Jimmy Trip thumbing through a porn mag the other day. Jeremy was surprised and embarrassed but Jimmy was turned on.Not wanting to spoil his friend's fun, Jimmy offered to help. Reluctantly, Jeremy agreed and the fun began.Jimmy services Jeremy over here, and over there. Standing up, sitting down and laying on his side. Jeremy had his first guy on guy experience with Tommy day a week before, but it seems he getting use to the fact that guys give the best head.Enjoy!
title: Jeremy & Jimmy
